q_en: How many sewing tasks did Skilled Sewers complete before June 2024, and what types of products were produced for these sewing tasks?

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM working_group WHERE name = 'Skilled Sewers' AND type = 'sew';
steps.description: Retrieve the ID of the working group named 'Skilled Sewers'

steps.sql: ['SELECT st.id, st.order_product_id FROM sewing_tasks st WHERE st.working_group_id = 7 AND st.end_time < '2024-06-01';']
steps.description: Find the sewing tasks completed by the 'Skilled Sewers' group before June 2024
steps.results: (1064, "You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near '['SELECT st.id, st.order_product_id FROM sewing_tasks st WHERE st.working_group_' at line 1")
